name: Lightning Rod
summary: The user is immune to all Electric-type attacks, as well as Electrify and Eerie Impulse. In addition, the use will receive a Special Attack boost.
viability: Lightning Rod is a wonderful ability, simply due to the abundance of Volt Switch. It works best on Pikachu, Raichu, and Manectric to their great Special Attack. One correct prediction and the Pok√©mon become instant threats. Seaking also gains an immunity to what should be weakness. That's always useful.
